name: thejacedev-skills
description: OpenAI image generation and other skills for Claude Code

plugins.name: openai-image-gen
plugins.description: Generate images using OpenAI's gpt-image-1.5 model via the Images API.

plugins.name: pixel-art-gen
plugins.description: Generate pixel art PNGs from text descriptions. Claude designs the art and renders it via a bundled Python script.
